metadata.title: CVE-2024-46819 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: the warning dereferencing obj for nbio_v7_4if ras_manager obj null, don't print NBIO err data

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
